mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.build_id AS "buildId", a.device_id AS "deviceId", a.device_name AS "deviceName", a.device_type AS "deviceType", a.note AS "note", a.status AS "status", a.source AS "source", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks", o2.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xf_device( id, office_id, build_id, device_id, device_name, device_type, note, status, source, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{buildId}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceType}, #{note}, #{status}, #{source}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xf_device SET office_id = #{office.id}, build_id = #{buildId}, device_id = #{deviceId}, device_name = #{deviceName}, device_type = #{deviceType}, note = #{note}, status = #{status}, source = #{source}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
